sentences.en: Even while the muscles appear flaccid, some nerve threads may be functional.
sentences.cn: 甚至当肌肉出现无力, 一些神经纤维可能还是有功能的.

sentences.en: Flaccid constipation is characterized by a lazy or atonic intestinal muscle.
sentences.cn: 无张力性便秘的特点是肠内肌肉松弛无力.

sentences.en: I picked up her wrist. It was limp and flaccid.
sentences.cn: 我抓起她绵软无力的手腕。

sentences.en: OBJECTIVE In order to supply the basis about the acute flaccid paralysis ( AFP ) cases surveillance.
sentences.cn: 目的为进一步做好急性迟缓性麻痹 ( AFP ) 病例监测,保持无脊髓灰质炎(脊灰)状态.

sentences.en: Objective To evaluate the working quality of Acute Flaccid Paralysis ( AFP ) case surveillance system.
sentences.cn: 目的评价急性弛缓性麻痹 ( AFP ) 病例监测系统运转情况.

sentences.en: Poliomyelitis ( or polio or infantile paralysis ) : Acute infectious viral disease that can cause flaccid paralysis of muscles.
sentences.cn: 小儿麻痹症: 病毒引起的急性传染病,会造成随意肌瘫痪无力.

words.tran_cn: [生理][植][医]弛缓的；软弱的；无活力的

phrases.tran_cn: 驰缓性麻痹；弛缓性瘫痪；松弛性麻痹；软瘫

trans.tran_cn: 软弱的，无活力的，松弛的
trans.tran_en: You use flaccid to describe a part of someone's body when it is unpleasantly soft and not hard or firm
